# TruffleHog exclusions for Claudette project
# Exclude known safe files and directories

# Package files
package-lock.json
node_modules/
dist/
build/

# Documentation and examples
*.md
docs/
README.*
CHANGELOG.*
*.example

# Configuration templates
*.config.json.example
claude-config-mcp.json.example

# Test files and fixtures
src/test/
tests/
**/*.test.js
**/*.test.ts
**/*.spec.js
**/*.spec.ts
test-*/

# Database files (local development)
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Cache and temporary files
cache/
.cache/
tmp/
temp/
*.log

# Backup directories
*-backup*/
aneos-project*/

# Git and CI files
.git/
.github/workflows/
.github/dependabot.yml

# TypeScript build artifacts
*.tgz
claudette-*.tgz
